author.name: Bryan Berry - Nathen Harvey - Matt Ray

entry.title: Civic Hacking
entry.content:
Join us for a conversation about Civic Hacking.

Panel

  • Chris Alfano github, twitter
  • Jill Huchital github, twitter
  • Kirsten Lambertsen github, twitter
  • Nell Shamrell-Harrington github, twitter, blog
  • Nathen Harvey github, twitter, blog

Upcoming Events

Outline

Have some questions for our panelists? Submit them via pull request (PR) to the show outline.

  • What are some organizations you have been involved with for civic hacking?
  • Why did you get involved with civic hacking?
  • What sort of projects have you worked on?
  • How do I get started doing this?

Jill
